review: Got this as part of the pre-order special from Amazon, and I love it! It's a really nice all in one media center stick that you can plug into the back of any "dumb" TV and turn it into smart TV with customizable apps. I love the fact that I can control it with the remote, or with a simple app I can control it anywhere in the house with my android smart phone. We use it extensively for Amazon Prime movies, Netflix, Amazon Music, etc...5 out of 5 stars, it's useful, easy to configure and fills a nice niche!
author: Joshua Collins

review: So far I love it.  It makes strolling the streaming world very easy.  Currently loving ARCHER and all that geniusly written hilarity.The ONLY drawback is that they've made the little remote bright black.  Dull black.  Invisible black.  Lose it anywhere and can't see it black.  I recommend spray paint or bright duct tape.  Your friends might think you're a doof, but at least you won't be walking in circles muttering "Where's The #@%# Remote??"
